description:
Let the forces of evil tremble in fear (along with wealthy merchants and innocent bystanders)... THE SLAYERS ARE BACK! Join the not-so-heroic adventures of Lina Inverse--the super-cute sorceress who steals from the rich and keeps it for herself! Along with her sword-swinging (but dumber than dirt) sidekick, Gourry, her hyper-enthusiastic protégé, Amelia, and the tormented and overly-serious golem, Zelgadis, there's nothing Lina can't do!

(Source: Software Sculptors)

title.romaji: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
title.english: KONOSUBA -God's blessing on this wonderful world!
title.native: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！
title.userPreferred: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!

title.native: イクシオン サーガ DT

episodes.title: The Sudden Pinch! The Terror of the Monstrous Zoamelgustar!
The Roguish Priest! His Name is Xellos!
A Wonderful Business! Being A Bodyguard Isn't Easy!
An Ancient Pledge! One Who Seeks Immortality!
Staying Behind for the Sake of Love!
You Can't Escape! The Return of the Obsessive Martina!
Sudden Cooking! Follow the Phantom Dragon!
Be Eternal! The Day Prince Phil Died?
Hidden Ambitions! The Shocking Confession?
On a Journey With a Pack of Scoundrels?! Take Back That Magic Power!
Voices of Darkness! Slash 'Em to Bits, Ragna Blade!
The Unexpected End? The Shocking Truth!
Impending Fall! The Moment of Ambition's Defeat!
The Forbidden Dance? Where is the Strongest Spell?
A Big Crash? The Battle at Artemay Tower?
Bitter Curve Balls! Gutsy Fast Balls!
They're Talking About a Girl Named Zelgadis?!
The Temple of Sand! The Secret of the Giga Slave!
Disclosure at Last?! Xellos' True Form!
No Other Choice! Set Course for Dragon Valley!
The Thousand Year Old Truth! The Traitorous Demon Dragon King!
The Stolen Sword of Light! The End of the Demon Dragon King!
The Menacing Swordsman! A Journey of Reunion!
Sinister Trap! The Mysterious City of Ghosts!
The Souls of the Dead! Lina's Final Decision!
Go to NEXT! And Then Again?
